Sentence.value: You will also learn: - How to breathe, visualize, and use your labor coach - More about how to manage pain during labor, such as epidural and other medicines Having a plan and knowing ways to manage pain will help you feel more relaxed and in control when the day arrives.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: You will also learn: - How to breathe, visualize, and use your labor coach - More about how to manage pain during labor, such as epidural and other [[medicines|C0013227]] Having a plan and knowing ways to manage [[pain|C0030193]] will help you feel more relaxed and in control when the day arrives.

Sentence.value: Most women do not know exactly how their labor will go, how they will cope with the pain, or what they will need until they are in labor.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Most [[women|C0043210]] do not know exactly how their labor will go, how they will cope with the [[pain|C0030193]], or what they will need until they are in labor.
